title: [SOLVED]820-3209: Random shutdown
message:
Hi, 

Water damaged 820-3209 randomly shutting down. Measured current sensing:

Total charger side: 2.5
R7051: 0.1
R7052: 2.2

Total PP DC-in side: 20.2
7021  10.1
7022: 10.1

Any good ideas?

Cheers, Rick

title: [SOLVED]820-3209: Random shutdown
message: Run EFI ASD (3S150) and report error messages........

title: [SOLVED]820-3209: Random shutdown
message: If that doesn't report anything I fixed one that would shutdown when going to sleep by replacing the trackpad and flex.

title: [SOLVED]820-3209: Random shutdown
message: Spot on Duke. Thanks it works!
